bibl.title: Three Greek Ostraca from the Egyptian Museum in Cairo.

series.title: The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.note: 3 ostraca under the same Inv. Nr. (O. Cair. Inv. SR 18955). - 1. Receipt for survey-tax on date-land. Elephantine, 8 January AD 110. - 2. Receipt for merismoi, 1 April AD 148. - 3. Receipt for poll tax, 5 February AD 97.
bibl.seg: Shareen A. Aly, Three Greek Ostraca from the Egyptian Museum in Cairo.

Tomasz Derda, Adam Łajtar & Jakub Urbanik (edd.), in cooperation with Andrzej Mirończuk & Tomasz Ochała, Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology, Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013. Volume II. Subliterary Papyri, Documentary Papyri, Scribal Practices, Linguistic Matters = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVIII (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 967-973, 3 figg.

3 ostraca under the same Inv. Nr. (O. Cair. Inv. SR 18955). - 1. Receipt for survey-tax on date-land. Elephantine, 8 January AD 110. - 2. Receipt for merismoi, 1 April AD 148. - 3. Receipt for poll tax, 5 February AD 97.
